foreignData.name: Himmelsritter-Vorhut
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn die Himmelsritter-Vorhut angreift, erzeuge einen getappten und angreifenden 1/1 weißen Soldat-Kreaturenspielstein.

foreignData.name: Vanguardia de caballeros celestes
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que la Vanguardia de caballeros celestes ataque, crea una ficha de criatura Soldado blanca 1/1 que está girada y atacando.

foreignData.name: Avant-garde des chevaliers célestes
foreignData.text:
Vol
À chaque fois que l'Avant-garde des chevaliers célestes attaque, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Soldat, engagé et attaquant.

foreignData.name: Avanguardia dei Cavalieri dei Cieli
foreignData.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta l'Avanguardia dei Cavalieri dei Cieli attacca, crea una pedina creatura Soldato 1/1 bianca TAPpata e attaccante.

foreignData.name: 空騎士の先兵
foreignData.text:
飛行
空騎士の先兵が攻撃するたび、白の１/１の兵士・クリーチャー・トークンを１体、タップ状態で攻撃している状態で生成する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・騎士

foreignData.name: 창공기사 선봉대
foreignData.text:
비행
창공기사 선봉대가 공격할 때마다, 탭되어 공격 중인 1/1 백색 병사 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignData.name: Vanguarda de Cavaleiros Celestes
foreignData.text:
Voar
Toda vez que Vanguarda de Cavaleiros Celestes atacar, crie uma ficha de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Soldado virada e atacando.

foreignData.name: Авангард Небесных Рыцарей
foreignData.text:
Полет
Каждый раз, когда Авангард Небесных Рыцарей атакует, создайте одну фишку существа 1/1 белый Солдат повернутой и атакующей.

foreignData.name: 空骑士先锋
foreignData.text:
飞行
每当空骑士先锋攻击时，派出一个1/1白色战士衍生生物，其为横置且正进行攻击。

foreignData.name: 空騎士先鋒
foreignData.text:
飛行
每當空騎士先鋒攻擊時，派出一個1/1白色戰士衍生生物，其為橫置且正進行攻擊。

name: Skyknight Vanguard
originalText:
Flying
Whenever Skyknight Vanguard attacks, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking.

rulings.text: You choose which player or planeswalker the token is attacking. It doesn’t have to be attacking the same player or planeswalker that Skyknight Vanguard is attacking.

Although the token is an attacking creature, it was never declared as an attacking creature. This means that abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks won’t trigger when the token enters the battlefield attacking.

text:
Flying
Whenever Skyknight Vanguard attacks, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking.
